<file path="/home/janreges/ai-distiller/testdata/cpp/01_basic/source.cpp">
#include "iostream"
#include "string"
#include "vector"
class Point {
    void constructor()
    void constructor(double x, double y)
    void constructor(Point& other)
    virtual void destructor()
    double getX()
    double getY()
    void setX(double x)
    void setY(double y)
    virtual double distanceFromOrigin()
    *bool validateCoordinates()
    -double x_;
    -double y_;
    -void internalCalculation()
class Point3D : public Point {
    void constructor(double x, double y, double z)
    double getZ()
    void setZ(double z)
    double distanceFromOrigin()
    -double z_;
class Container {
    void constructor(T& value)
    T () const
    void setValue(T& value)
    -T value_;
T max(T& a, T& b) {
return (a > b) ? a : b;
}
T min(T& a, T& b) {
return (a < b) ? a : b;
}
int main()
</file>
